Comment: What have you tried so far?
\item Split the input string on spaces, then split each of those words on spaces and convert them to lowercase.
This will give you a list of words in the input sentence.
Then iterate over that list and for each word, check if it exists in the dictionary.
If it doesn't exist, add it to the dictionary with its translation.
Otherwise, get the translation from the dictionary and append it to your output string.
